member.name: M:WindowsGame1.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: The main entry point for the application.

member.name: T:WindowsGame1.Game1
member.summary: This is the main type for your game

member.name: M:WindowsGame1.Game1.Initialize
member.summary: Allows the game to perform any initialization it needs to before starting to run. This is where it can query for any required services and load any non-graphic related content. Calling MyBase.Initialize will enumerate through any components and initialize them as well.

member.name: M:WindowsGame1.Game1.LoadContent
member.summary: LoadContent will be called once per game and is the place to load all of your content.

member.name: M:WindowsGame1.Game1.Update(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GameTime)
member.summary: Allows the game to run logic such as updating the world, checking for collisions, gathering input, and playing audio.
member.param: Provides a snapshot of timing values.

member.name: M:WindowsGame1.Game1.Draw(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GameTime)
member.summary: This is called when the game should draw itself.
member.param: Provides a snapshot of timing values.
